LUKE 5.33 iþ eis qeþun du imma:
duƕe siponjos Iohannes fastand ufta jah bidos taujand, samaleiko jah Fareisaiei, iþ þai þeinai siponjos matjand jah drigkand?
LUKE 5.34 þaruh is qaþ du im:
ni magud sununs bruþfadis, unte sa bruþfads miþ im ist, gataujan fastan.
LUKE 5.35 aþþan qimand dagos, jah þan afnimada af im sa bruþfads, jah þan fastand in jainaim dagam.
LUKE 5.36 qaþuh þan jah gajukon du im, þatei
ainshun plat snagins niujis ni lagjid ana snagan fairnjana,
aiþþau jah sa niuja aftaurnid, jah þamma fairnjin ni gatimid þata af þamma niujin.
LUKE 5.37 jah ainshun ni giutid wein niujata in balgins fairnjans,
aiþþau distairid þata niujo wein þans balgins jah silbo usgutniþ, jah þai balgeis fraqistnand;
LUKE 5.38 ak wein juggata in balgins niujans giutand, jah bajoþs gafastanda.
LUKE 5.39 jah ainshun drigkandane fairni, ni suns wili jugg;
LUKE 6.1 Jah warþ in sabbato anþaramma frumin gaggan imma þairh atisk, jah raupidedun ahsa siponjos is jah matidedun bnauandans handum.
LUKE 6.2 iþ sumai Fareisaie qeþun du im:
ƕa taujid þatei ni skuld ist taujan in sabbato dagam?
LUKE 6.3 jah andhafjands wiþra ins Iesus qaþ:
ni þata ussuggwud þatei gatawida Daweid, þan gredags was, silba jah þaiei miþ imma wesun?
LUKE 6.4 ƕaiwa inngalaiþ in gard gudis jah hlaibans faurlageinais usnam jah matida jah gaf þaim miþ sis wisandam, þanzei ni skuld ist matjan, nibai ainaim gudjam?
LUKE 6.5 jah qaþ du im þatei frauja ist sa sunus mans jah þamma sabbato daga.
LUKE 6.6 jah warþ þan in anþaramma daga sabbato galeiþan imma in swnagogein jah laisjan.
jah was jainar manna, jah handus is so taihswo was þaursus.
LUKE 6.7 witaidedunuh þan þai bokarjos jah Fareisaieis, jau in sabbato daga leikinodedi, ei bigeteina til du wrohjan ina.
LUKE 6.8 iþ is wissuh mitonins ize jah qaþ du þamma mann, þamma þaursja habandin handu:
LUKE 6.9 qaþ þan Iesus du im:
ƕa skuld ist sabbato dagam, þiuþ taujan þau unþiuþ taujan, saiwala ganasjan þau usqistjan?
LUKE 6.10 jah ussaiƕands allans ins qaþ du imma:
þaruh is ufrakida, jah gastoþ so handus is, swaswe so anþara.
LUKE 6.11 iþ eis fullai waurþun unfrodeins jah rodidedun du sis misso ƕa tawidideina þamma Iesua.
LUKE 6.12 jah warþ in dagam þaim, ei usiddja Iesus in fairguni bidjan;
jah was naht þairwakands in bidai gudis.

LUKE 6.13 jah biþe warþ dags, atwopida siponjans seinans jah gawaljands us im twalib, þanzei jah apaustuluns namnida: LUKE 6.14 Seimon þanei jah namnida Paitru, jah Andraian broþar is; Iakobu jah Iohannen, Filippu jah Barþulomaiu; LUKE 6.15 Maþþaiu jah Þoman, Iakobu þana Alfaius jah Seimon þana haitanan Zeloten; LUKE 6.16 Iudan Iakobaus jah Iudan Iskarioten, saei jah warþ galewjands ina.

LUKE 6.17 jah atgaggands dalaþ miþ im gastoþ ana stada ibnamma jah hiuma siponje is jah hansa mikila manageins af allamma Iudaias jah Iairusalem jah þize faur marein Twre jah Seidone , LUKE 6.18 þaiei qemun hausjan imma jah hailjan sik sauhte seinaizo;
jah þai anahabaidans fram ahmam unhrainjaim, jah gahailidai waurþun.
LUKE 6.19 jah alla managei sokidedun attekan imma, unte mahts af imma usiddja jah ganasida allans.
LUKE 6.20 jah is ushafjands augona seina du siponjam seinaim qaþ:
audagai jus unledans ahmin, unte izwara ist þiudangardi himine.
LUKE 6.21 audagai jus gredagans nu, unte sadai wairþiþ.
audagai jus gretandans nu, unte ufhlohjanda.
LUKE 6.22 audagai sijuþ, þan fijand izwis mans jah afskaidand izwis jah idweitjand jah uswairpand namin izwaramma swe ubilamma in sunaus mans;
LUKE 6.23 faginod in jainamma daga jah laikid, unte sai, mizdo izwara managa in himinam;
